name: naver-search-engine
title: Naver Search Engine
description: An extension to look up words in the Naver dictionary or search for content with the Naver search engine.
author: kw-lee

commands.name: na-search
commands.title: Search Word
commands.subtitle: Naver Search Engine
commands.description: Search the word in the Naver

commands.name: ns-search
commands.title: Search Shopping Items
commands.subtitle: Naver Search Engine
commands.description: Search the shopping items in the Naver Shopping

commands.name: nae-search
commands.title: Search Korean-English Dictionary
commands.subtitle: Naver Search Engine
commands.description: Search the word in the Naver Korean-English dictionary

commands.name: nak-search
commands.title: Search Korean Dictionary
commands.subtitle: Naver Search Engine
commands.description: Search the word in the Naver Korean dictionary

commands.name: nask-search
commands.title: Search Sino-Korean (Hanja) Dictionary
commands.subtitle: Naver Search Engine
commands.description: Search the word in the Naver Sino-Korean (Hanja) dictionary
